in: body

Maximum memory of the container
in: body

action.description:

Unknown, default to 1, but not necessary

A list of service IDs that need to get the status. If not specified, return the status of all applications in the tenant

Values.description:
It is typically used for query parameters and form values.
Unlike in the http.Header map, the keys in a Values map
are case-sensitive.
Values.title: Values maps a string key to a list of values.
